tiles.title: Heartbeat Counts
Install_Enable_Counts
tiles.query:
let MMAInstallEnableCount = //pull MMA install enable information
    union cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').WinMMADailySnapshot, 
    cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').LnxMMADailySnapshot
    | summarize
        WindowsInstallSuccessCount = dcountif(ResourceId, Operation in~ ("Install", "OnPluginInstallEnd") and ExtName =~ "microsoft.enterprisecloud.monitoring.microsoftmonitoringagent" ),
        LinuxInstallSuccessCount = dcountif(ResourceId, Operation in~ ("Install", "OnPluginInstallEnd") and ExtName =~ "microsoft.enterprisecloud.monitoring.omsagentforlinux" ),
        WindowsEnableSuccessCount = dcountif(ResourceId, Operation in~ ("Enable", "OnPluginEnableEnd") and ExtName =~ "microsoft.enterprisecloud.monitoring.microsoftmonitoringagent" ),
        LinuxEnableSuccessCount = dcountif(ResourceId, Operation in~ ("Enable", "OnPluginEnableEnd") and ExtName =~ "microsoft.enterprisecloud.monitoring.omsagentforlinux" )
        by startofweek(Date);
MMAInstallEnableCount
